title: Best Paper Award at AAAI 2025
description: Our paper on "Multi-Agent Causal Discovery using Large Language Models" received the Best Paper Award at AAAI 2025.

title: New PhD Students Join Our Lab
description: We welcome three new PhD students specializing in causal inference, deep learning, and time series analysis.

title: New Research Grant from NSF
description: Awarded $2.5M NSF grant for research on "Explainable AI for Industrial Systems Monitoring and Anomaly Detection".

title: Industry Partnership with Tesla
description: Established new collaboration with Tesla for advanced manufacturing quality control using AI-driven anomaly detection.

title: 5 Papers Accepted at Top Venues
description: Five research papers accepted at NeurIPS 2024, ICLR 2025, and IEEE TASE, showcasing our advances in ML and AI.

title: Student Award at ICML 2024
description: PhD student Hao Duong Le wins Outstanding Student Paper Award at ICML 2024 for work on causal discovery.

title: International Conference Presentation
description: Prof. Chen Zhang delivered keynote speech on "Future of AI in Industrial Applications" at AI Summit Singapore.

title: Open Source Software Release
description: Released XTRAFFIC dataset and analysis tools for traffic and incident correlation research to the open source community.
